question: How many companies are honoured with the 2019 CSR Journal Excellence Awards?
explanation: Six companies — Tata Power, ReNew Power, Hindustan Zinc, Aditya Birla Capital Ltd., YES Bank Ltd. and Mahindra & Mahindra — emerged winners in the CSR Journal Excellence Awards. In the 3rd edition of awards, there were six categories — education and skill training, women empowerment and child welfare, agriculture and rural development, sports, health and sanitation and environment.  The awards are instituted by The CSR Journal, a digital and print news publication. The theme of the event was ‘India First’.
